name: Bit OS
short_description:
Bit OS is an aggressive little Linux Distro bent on world domination, codenamed Dark Penguin. Based on the ever pupular Linux Mint with a slightly darker theme, and builtin Bitcoin goodies.

So all your friends ever talk about is Bit OS. How do you get your hands on it? Just download and install, it's free. Easy. Run Live from USB, Upgrade from Ubuntu, or install along side Windows. 

Great I have bitcoin and devcoin wallets, now, how do I fill them with coin? Bit OS has a built in mining screensaver to earn you coin while your computer sleeps. Kickback and watch your coin value skyrocket.  

Want more Bitcoins? You could apply for an account on Mt. Gox and do an international wire transfer but who needs the headache. Look around your appartment. What a bunch of junk. Just put some stuff up on Craig's List to trade for Bitcoins. 

Now you've been bit. Spread the epedemic.

Donate!
